tossup_question: 4) CHEMISTRY   Which of the following best describes the following reaction: 2Mg (s) + O2 (g) →  2MgO (s)?
tossup_MCQoptions:
W) combination 
X) decomposition 
Y) single replacement 
Z) combustion
